title: Manhattan Target
description: I WAS HIS TARGET ever since I stepped into La Casa Rossa.I never expected Dominic Dragna.He’s not a hero. He’s no prince charming.He’s the villain in any happily ever after story you’ve ever read.VILLAINS NEED LOVE TOO … right?And I’m the woman strong enough to give it to him.A stripper falling for her brooding boss.It’s almost comical if he didn’t tie me in heated knots.Only, he’s so much more than my boss.Something I could not have envisaged.I’m quickly entangled in his dangerous world.Dominic is a man like no other, with close ties to the mob and a heart that beats for me. Perfection is for other couples.Daring. Immoral. Powerful.A good girl might want a gentleman.I’ll take the untouchable hitman who owns me heart and soul. He’s not without peril.Because I took one look at that man and TARGETED HIM BACK AS MINE.Complete standalone romance with some familiar faces thrown in from previous books.
author: V. Theia
